DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Subtype of discrete accessory. If USERDEFINED, the type is further qualified by means of the inherited attribute _ObjectType_. Refer to _IfcDiscreteAccessoryType_ for a non-exclusive list of userdefined type designations which are applicable to _IfcDiscreteAccessory_ as well.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcDiscreteAccessoryType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcDiscreteAccessoryTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcDiscreteAccessoryTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an _IfcDiscreteAccessoryType_.
